name: Brent Johnson
known_for: Dollar Milkshake Theory (2018)
framework: US structural advantages pull global capital inward; dollar + gold rise together

name: Elon Musk
known_for: Building at the intersection of AI compute, energy, robotics, and space
framework: Energy as ultimate constraint; triple exponential in robotics; work becomes optional

name: David Martin
known_for: Shaping Miami zoning and development policy
framework: Market-based urbanism; missing middle housing; residential-first growth

name: Jeff Yan
known_for: $1B community airdrop → $10B protocol, 11-person team
framework: Build robust primitives, let ecosystem scale; DeFi before AI takes over

name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
role: Author (Black Swan, Antifragile), former options trader
known_for: Tail-risk theory, fat-tailed distributions, anti-fragility
framework: Tail risks are systematically underpriced; trust empirical evidence over models

name: Po-Shen Loh
role: Carnegie Mellon math professor, former US Math Olympiad team coach
known_for: Expii educational platform, math as thinking curriculum
framework: Math as the last curriculum for original thinking; boredom precedes creativity; authenticity is human advantage

name: Dario Amodei
known_for: Scaling laws research, Constitutional AI, safety-first AI development
framework: Intelligence = data + compute + model size (no theory for why); application layer has the moats; steer AI, don't stop it

name: Enterprise AI Panel
role: Panel discussion on organizational AI deployment
known_for: Intent engineering framework — making organizational values machine-readable
framework: Intent > prompts; organizational alignment beats raw model capability; mediocre model + great intent infrastructure > frontier model with no alignment

name: Stan Druckenmiller
role: Founder, Duquesne Family Office (formerly Duquesne Capital Management)
known_for: ~30% annualized returns, zero losing years 1981-2010. Former Soros Quantum Fund lead PM. Macro legend.
framework: Pattern recognition over analysis; expert-enthusiasm-as-signal; courage in sizing; 18mo-3yr time horizons

name: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
role: Secretary of Health and Human Services
known_for: MAHA (Make America Healthy Again), environmental law, vaccine skepticism, 2024 presidential candidate
framework: Perverse incentive analysis — follow the money to understand why systems produce bad outcomes. Food as root cause of chronic disease epidemic.

name: Chamath Palihapitiya
role: CEO Social Capital, All-In Podcast host
known_for: Early Facebook, SPAC king, macro/venture crossover, public markets analysis
framework: When→If repricing framework; structural market analysis; degrossing signals

name: David Sacks
role: White House AI/Crypto Czar, All-In Podcast host, former PayPal/Yammer/Craft
known_for: PayPal Mafia, Trump administration AI policy, energy policy
framework: Fixed pie fallacy; seen vs unseen heuristic; competing sci-fi narratives

name: Jason Calacanis
known_for: Early Uber investor, media/venture crossover, agent maestro concept
framework: Operator-first; practical AI deployment; bipartisanship

name: David Friedberg
role: CEO The Production Board, All-In Podcast host
known_for: Climate Corp (sold to Monsanto), science-based investing, macro thinking
framework: Consumptive capacity limits; knowledge work as transitory; productivity vs demand

name: Julian Goldie
role: AI/SEO YouTuber, AI Profit Boardroom community
known_for: Practical AI tool reviews, early adoption testing, business workflow integration
framework: ROI-first tool evaluation; consumer accessibility matters; orchestration > single model

name: Cathie Wood
known_for: Disruptive innovation investing, ARKK ETF, Tesla/Bitcoin bull, Wright's Law framework
framework: Wright's Law learning curves; wall of worry > euphoria; convergence of technologies; embodied AI > software AI

name: Brian Casel
role: Solo SaaS builder, Builder Methods / Builder Methods Pro
known_for: Practical AI adoption for builders, OpenClaw multi-agent setup, Claude Code workflows
framework: Hiring metaphor for agent security; model routing optimization; build what doesn't exist

name: Illia Polosukhin
role: Co-founder Near Protocol, co-author 'Attention Is All You Need' (Transformer paper)
known_for: Transformer architecture, Near Protocol, blockchain+AI convergence, intent infrastructure
framework: Blockchain as agent infrastructure; economic alignment > safety alignment; post-labor economy via intent marketplaces; formal verification as existential necessity

name: Vlad Tenev
known_for: Democratizing retail investing, Robinhood IPO, commission-free trading, now private markets access
framework: Retail as permanent capital; data-driven deal sourcing; making public company brand aspirational again

name: Bill Ackman
known_for: Activist investing, public market analysis, direct communication style
framework: Value creation through access; in-kind distributions; capital recycling

name: Alan Watts
known_for: Popularizing Eastern philosophy for Western audiences, Zen Buddhism, Taoism, the art of letting go
framework: The Great Pretending; letting go ≠ giving up; caring without clinging; action without anxiety; life as improvisation

name: Naval Ravikant
known_for: How to Get Rich (without getting lucky), Almanack of Naval, early Uber/Twitter investor, intersection of technology + philosophy + wealth
framework: No demand for average; every human as spellcaster; AI alpha competes to zero; knowledge one layer below; compression → abstraction; unaligned humans not AI

name: Michael Saylor
known_for: Largest corporate Bitcoin holder, STRC/Stretch digital credit instrument, capital-to-credit conversion
framework: Digital capital → digital credit signal processing; reflexive flywheel; programmable credit across types/platforms/currencies; competing with $300T garbagey credit

name: Donald J. Trump
known_for: Operation Midnight Hammer, Iran military campaign, tariff policy, DOGE
framework: Maximum pressure + military force; explicit regime change invitation; ultimatum diplomacy

name: Jordi Visser
role: Former CIO Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisors, independent macro strategist
known_for: Turbulence Model, K-shaped economy thesis, AI/crypto convergence, software-as-prediction-markets framework
framework: AI compresses time → software becomes binary → prediction market repricing; survive-and-thrive cycles; crypto as fastest horse post-crisis; bottom-up disruption > enterprise adoption

name: Anthony Pompliano
role: Host of The Pomp Podcast, Bitcoin advocate, entrepreneur
known_for: Bitcoin advocacy, interviewing macro/crypto/tech leaders, simplifying complex topics
framework: Bitcoin maximalism with practical orientation; interview-driven thesis development

name: Lyn Alden
known_for: Financial plumbing analysis, monetary mechanics, bridging trad-fi and Bitcoin
framework: Follow the plumbing — bank cash ratios, balance sheet mechanics, liquidity cycles. Gradual print > nuclear print. Asset-specific factors dominate in low-stimulus regimes.

name: Natalie Brunell
known_for: Bitcoin journalism, interviewing macro/crypto thinkers
framework: Interview-driven; Bitcoin advocacy with macro context

name: Greg Isenberg
role: Entrepreneur, advisor to TikTok and Reddit, host of Startup Ideas Podcast
known_for: Practical AI tool reviews for founders, community-led growth, built and sold 3 startups
framework: Hands-on testing > theory; agents as unfair advantage for solo founders; 'OpenClawification' of the internet

name: Ben Horowitz
known_for: The Hard Thing About Hard Things, a16z crypto fund, early AI/crypto VC
framework: Crypto as AI's native money; fiat failed agents; Apple OpenClaw pivot; RSI already here; unlimited entrepreneurial opportunity

name: Peter Diamandis
role: Founder XPRIZE, Singularity University; host Moonshots podcast
known_for: Abundance mindset, space entrepreneurship, longevity, exponential thinking
framework: Abundance over scarcity; space as next frontier; AI + robotics = post-scarcity

name: Alex (The Innermost Loop)
known_for: The Innermost Loop newsletter, deep AI tracking, contrarian on hype
framework: Defensive co-scaling; fiat failed agents; RSI already here; AI solves physics in 2 years

name: Joe Lonsdale
known_for: Palantir, American Optimist podcast, defense/enterprise tech investing
framework: Invention eras reset everyone; returns to agency are very high; build on existing frameworks (St Patrick strategy)

name: JD Ross
known_for: Opendoor, AI-native insurance brokerage, zero-code engineering team
framework: SaaS barbell (model cos eat top, individuals eat middle, trusted experts survive); Jevons Paradox for engineering; writer→editor transition
